global.title: Title
global.server-error: An unknown error has occurred, please contact your administrator for assistance.
global.update-comment: Add a comment to describe the changes.
global.name: Name

error.invalid-id: ID must not contain special characters, use alpha-numerical characters.

main.title: Welcome to Mica!
main.subtitle: Mica allows you to manage the studies and the datasets of the data portal.

logged.userMessage: You are logged in as user "{{username}}".
logged.adminMessage: You are logged in as user "{{username}}" with administrator rights.

error.authentication: Authentication failed! Please check your credentials and try again.
error.userBanned: Too many login failures. Please try again later.

caching.title: Caching
caching.help: Various caches help Mica to be more responsive. Depending on the cache settings, the retention policy can vary a lot (time out, memory and/or disk persistence etc.). See server documentation for more details. After a cache was deleted, it is rebuild during the flow of queries. Dataset variable statistics can be rebuild explicitly, making Mica more resilient when a remote Opal server is down.
caching.opal-taxonomies-help: Taxonomies from primary Opal server. To be cleared after taxonomies have been updated in Opal.
caching.mica-config-help: Mica system various settings. Cache is automatically cleared each time the configuration is updated.
caching.aggregations-metadata-help: Acronyms and names of published studies, networks etc. that are used to decorate search results. Cache is automatically cleared each time a new publication is made.
caching.dataset-variables-help: For each dataset, variable summaries are extracted from remote Opal servers. Cache is automatically cleared after a dataset is published.
caching.agate-subjects-help: Users details are cached once retrieved from Agate server. To be cleared to synchronize with updated user details.
caching.authorization-help: Anything accessed in Mica requires authorization. Cache is automatically cleared after a permission is updated.

indexing.title: Indexing
indexing.help: The search engine is based on indexed documents. Each index can be rebuilt without affecting the history of changes and the publication status of the documents.
indexing.all-help: Indices about any type of document: network, study, dataset (and associated variables), file, person.
indexing.networks-help: Index that allows to search for networks.
indexing.studies-help: Index that allows to search for studies.
indexing.datasets-help: Index that allows to search for datasets of any type and associated variables.
indexing.collected-datasets-help: Index that allows to search for collected datasets and associated variables.
indexing.harmonized-datasets-help: Index that allows to search for harmonized datasets and associated variables.
indexing.taxonomies-help: Index that allows to search for taxonomy terms (i.e. the search criteria).

errors.title: Error page!
errors.403: You are not authorized to access the page.

localized.completed: The field must be completed in all specified languages.

config.title: General Configuration
config.name: Name
config.name-help: Name of your organization that will be used when sending notification emails.
config.publicUrl-help: Public base URL of the server that will be used when sending notification emails.
config.portalUrl-help: Public base URL of the portal that will be used when sharing draft.
config.languages-help: Languages into which the content must be capture.
config.opal-help: The public URL of the Opal server that is the source of variables and data summaries when no study-specific one is defined.
config.privacy-threshold-help: No data summary will be returned if the number of participants is below this threshold.
config.opal-credentials-help: When Mica needs to connect to remote Opal server, some credentials must be provided for authentication. These credentials can be based on an encryption key pair (HTTPS only) or a user name and password. See also Opal data access administration documentation.
config.encryption-keys-help: HTTPS connection requires to have a private key and a public key (certificate) defined. A self-signed key-pair is available by default. You can provide your own.
config.openAccess-help: Access to published documents is opened to everyone.
config.single-network-enabled-help: Only one network is present in Mica.
config.single-study-enabled-help: Only one individual study is present in Mica.
config.roles-help: A person can be member of a study or of a network with one of the listed roles. * Use the prefix 'contact.label.' to change the translation.
config.delete-role-confirm: This operation will remove members with this role from all documents, i.e. studies, networks. Are you sure you want to delete role "{{role}}"?
config.role-character-error: Role identifier contains invalid characters. Please avoid characters such as uppercase, spaces, '~' and '!'.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.info: Notification emails can be sent to relevant users and groups.
notifications.study-info: Recipients of study updates notifications have at least Editor permission (when status is Draft) or Reviewer permission (when status is Deleted or Under Review).
notifications.study-help: Send email notifications when study status changes to Deleted, to Under review or to Draft.
notifications.study-subject-help-long: Email subject can contain the following placeholders: ${organization}, ${documentType}, ${documentId}, ${status}.
notifications.network-info: Recipients of network updates notifications have at least Editor permission (when status is Draft) or Reviewer permission (when status is Deleted or Under Review).
notifications.network-help: Send email notifications when network status changes to Deleted, to Under review or to Draft.
notifications.network-subject-help-long: Email subject can contain the following placeholders: ${organization}, ${documentType}, ${documentId}, ${status}.
notifications.collected-dataset-info: Recipients of collected dataset updates notifications have at least Editor permission (when status is Draft) or Reviewer permission (when status is Deleted or Under Review).
notifications.collected-dataset: On collected dataset status changed notification
notifications.collected-dataset-subject: Subject of collected dataset status notification
notifications.collected-dataset-help: Send email notifications when collected dataset status changes to Deleted, to Under review or to Draft.
notifications.collected-dataset-subject-help-long: Email subject can contain the following placeholders: ${organization}, ${documentType}, ${documentId}, ${status}.
notifications.harmonized-dataset-info: Recipients of harmonized dataset updates notifications have at least Editor permission (when status is Draft) or Reviewer permission (when status is Deleted or Under Review).
notifications.harmonized-dataset: On harmonized dataset status changed notification
notifications.harmonized-dataset-subject: Subject of harmonized dataset status notification
notifications.harmonized-dataset-help: Send email notifications when harmonized dataset status changes to Deleted, to Under review or to Draft.
notifications.harmonized-dataset-subject-help-long: Email subject can contain the following placeholders: ${organization}, ${documentType}, ${documentId}, ${status}.
notifications.file-info: Recipients of file updates notifications have at least Editor permission (when status is Draft) or Reviewer permission (when status is Deleted or Under Review).
notifications.file-help: Send email notifications when files status changes to Deleted, to Under review or to Draft.
notifications.file-subject-help-long: Email subject can contain the following placeholders: ${organization}, ${documentType}, ${documentId}, ${status} and ${path} where document refers to the study (or network etc.) to which the file is attached.
notifications.comment-info: Recipients of comment updates notifications have at least Reader permission.
notifications.comment-help: Send email notifications when a comment is added or updated.
notifications.comment-subject-help-long: Email subject can contain the following placeholders: ${organization}, ${documentType}, ${documentId} and ${status} where document refers to the study (or network etc.) that was commented.
notifications.project-info: Recipients of research project updates notifications have at least Editor permission (when status is Draft) or Reviewer permission (when status is Deleted or Under Review).
notifications.project: On research project status changed notification
notifications.project-subject: Subject of research project status notification
notifications.project-help: Send email notifications when research project status changes to Deleted, to Under review or to Draft.
notifications.project-subject-help-long: Email subject can contain the following placeholders: ${organization}, ${documentType}, ${documentId}, ${status}.

style.title: Style
style.info: Override the default style with your own stylesheet. The CSS classes are the ones of Bootstrap (Bootswatch Flatly theme).

translations.title: Translations
translations.info: Override the default translations or add new ones.

import.title: Import Translations
import.label: Import
import.help: Use the JSON format to import custom translations.

export-json.label: JSON (all languages)
export-json.help: The custom translations will be exported in the JSON format.

export-gettext.label: Gettext
export-gettext.help: The complete translations will be exported in the Gettext format.

searchLayout.title: Search Layout
searchLayout.help: Switch the search page layout for Mica.
searchLayout.layout1-help: Layout emphasizing a search bar that maps keywords to available taxonomies.
searchLayout.layout2-help: Layout providing a search panel on the left-hand-side that displays the full taxonomy of various search categories (variable, study, and network).

numberOfParticipants.label: Number of participants
numberOfParticipants.suppl-info: Supplementary information about number of participants

study.label: Study
study.name: Name
study.follow-up-help: General information on follow up (profile, frequency).

access.label: Access
access.for: Access to external researchers or third parties provided or foreseen.
access.none: Access to external researchers or third parties neither provided nor foreseen.

study.documents-help: If applicable, please provide relevant documentation about the study (e.g.: Study Protocol).
study.help-text-timeline: Each colour in the timeline graph below represents a separate Study Population, while each segment in the graph represents a separate Data Collection Event. Clicking on a segment gives more detailed information on a Data Collection Event.

authorization.label: Authorization
authorization.maelstrom: Authorization from contributors to the Maelstrom catalogues
authorization.specific: Authorization from contributors to the [specific network] catalogues

study.opal-help: URL of the opal server for this study (if different from the default one).
study.unpublish-conflicts-message: The study has dependent published datasets. Please unpublish these datasets and try again.
study.delete-conflict-message: Found conflicts when trying to remove the study. Remove dependencies and try again.
study.population-delete-conflict-message: Found conflicts when trying to remove a population. Remove dependencies and try again.
study.population-dce-delete-conflict-message: Found conflicts when trying to remove a data collection event. Remove dependencies and try again.
study.population-or-dce-delete-conflict-messag: Found conflicts when trying to remove a population or a data collection event. Remove dependencies and try again.

delete-dialog.message: Are you sure to delete the study '{{arg0}}'?

restore-dialog.title: Restoring Study from Revision
restore-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to restore this revision from '{{arg0}}'?

member.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{type}} {{name}}?

search.placeholder: Search by first name, last name or institution...

dataset.name: Name

datasource.title: Data Source
datasource.info: Reference to the Opal table from which variables and data summaries will be extracted from.

delete-dialog.title: Delete Dataset
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete the dataset '{{arg0}}'?

network.title: Network
network.info: A network linked to this dataset.

harmonization-study.title: Harmonization Study
harmonization-study.info: A harmonization study linked to this dataset.

harmonization-study-population.title: Harmonization Study Population
harmonization-study-population.info: A harmonization study's population linked to this dataset.

study-table.title: Study Table
study-table.info: A study table defines which study data collection event it applies to and which Opal table the variables and data summaries are to be extracted from.

harmonization-study-table.title: Harmonization Study Table
harmonization-study-table.info: A harmonization study table defines which harmonization study population it applies to and which Opal table the variables and data summaries are to be extracted from.

study-tables.title: Study Tables
study-tables.info: The study tables define implementations of the harmonized variables. The data summaries will be extracted from the corresponding Opal tables.

harmonized-tables.title: Harmonized Tables
harmonized-tables.info: The study tables define implementations of the harmonized variables by an individual study in the context of a population's data collection event or a harmonization study based on previously harmonized data. The data summaries will be extracted from the corresponding Opal tables.

restore-dialog.title: Restoring Dataset from Revision
restore-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to restore this revision from '{{arg0}}'?

dataset.project-help: Project name from the study's Opal server (if this one is defined, otherwise the project is expected to be found in Opal primary server).
dataset.project-dataschema-help: Project name from the Opal primary server.
dataset.table-help: Opal table name from which variables and data summaries will be extracted.
dataset.table-dataschema-help: Project's table name from which variables will be extracted.

data-schema.title: Harmonized Dataset
data-schema.info: The variables of the harmonized dataset are the reference variables. This is a simple data dictionary: no data summaries will be extracted from the Opal table.

crosstab.title: Contingency Table
crosstab.query-help: Displays the multivariate frequency distribution of selected variables.
crosstab.privacy-check-failed: To prevent disclosure risk, results in the table above are not shown because at least one cell has between 1 to {{arg0}} observations.
crosstab.total-privacy-check-failed: To prevent disclosure risk, results in the table above are not shown because at least one category has between 1 to {{arg0}} observations.

harmonization.missing-attributes: In harmonization table, these attributes are mandatory : project, table, studyId, populationId
harmonization.study-not-published: Before publishing a harmonized dataset, its linked harmonization study must already be published
harmonization.population-not-published: Before publishing a harmonized dataset, its linked population must already be published

collection.study-not-published: Before publishing a collected dataset, its linked individual study must already be published
collection.population-not-published: Before publishing a collected dataset, its linked population must already be published

delete-dialog.message: Are you sure to delete the population?

modal.title: Share Link to Draft
modal.share-link-help-text: Shared link gives access to the latest draft version
modal.expiration-date-help-text: Shared link is permanently available when no expiration date is specified.

share-resource.error-no-portal-url: Impossible to generate a share link. A Portal URL should be set in the section Administration/General.

name: Name
author: Author
unsaved-prompt: Are you sure you want to leave this page? Unsaved changes will be lost.

entities-count.title: Entities Count
entities-count.help: Given a set of variables, the entities matching all the criteria for these variables can be counted.
entities-count.no-query: To count entities you need to select some variables first and then apply criteria on their values.

cart.title: Cart
cart.help: Use the cart to make a set of variables. This set can be analyzed or can be viewed in the search page.
cart.no-variables: The cart of variables is empty.
cart.no-variable-added: No variable has been added to the cart.
cart.no-variable-removed: No variable was removed from the cart.
cart.all-cart-page-selected: All items of this page are selected.
cart.all-cart-selected: All items of this cart are selected.
cart.select-all-cart: Select all items of this cart

search.title: Search
search.error: Impossible to search for now. Please try again later.
search.query-copy-help: Use the query in R or Python commands.

placeholder.all: e.g. alcohol, cancer, gender, cohort, twin
placeholder.dataset: Search by dataset name or type

search.in-help: Value is in at least one of the selected terms
search.contains-help: Value contains all the selected terms
search.no-coverage: Select some variable search criteria to see their corresponding coverage.
search.faceted-navigation-help: Select an entry from the menu on the left to start browsing in the repository.
search.search-not-available: Searching is unavailable for the current document section configuration.

classifications.title: Classifications
classifications.help: Navigate the classification system and select the search criteria.

permission.help: Grant permission to Read, Edit or Review the current draft.
permission.help-global: Grant permission to Read, Edit or Review any draft.
permission.label: permission
permission.reader-help: Read-only access to the document in draft mode with its revisions and its associated files.
permission.reader-config-help: Read-only access to the {{arg0}} with their revisions and their associated files.
permission.editor-help: Edit access to the document in draft mode with its revisions and its associated files. Publication or permanent deletion are not permitted.
permission.reviewer-help: Full access to the document, including its publication, permanent deletion and permissions.
permission.file-permission: Apply same permission to all associated files
permission.file-access: Apply Read access to all associated files

delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete the permission of {{arg0}} {{arg1}}

access.help: Grant Read access to the current publication.
access.principal-help: User or group unique name. Use wildcard * for specifying anyone or any group.

delete-dialog.title: Delete Access
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete the access of {{arg0}} {{arg1}}

title: Title

help.general: Configure Opal server, locale and server properties.
help.notifications: Notification emails can be sent to relevant users and groups.
help.style: Override the default style with your own stylesheet.

help.network-config: Configure Network form, permissions and search.
help.individual-study-config: Configure Study form, permissions and search.
help.harmonization-study-config: Configure Harmonization Study form, permissions and search.

taxonomy.name-not-found: The taxonomy with the name '{{arg0}}' is not found.
taxonomy.range-criterion-missing-terms: The criterion '{{arg0}}' must have terms to define its range intervals.
taxonomy.range-criterion-missing-range-attribute: The criterion '{{arg0}}' with terms must be marked as having range intervals.
taxonomy.duplicate-criterion-alias: The field '{{arg0}}' already has an associated criterion. Only a numerical field can have two criteria, a discrete and a range criterion.

data-access-amendment.not-enabled: Data Access Amendment operations are disabled, contact your administrator to enable this functionality.

file.invalid-paste: You can not paste in the same path.

search-results.current-sub: Search results in current folder and sub-folders

data-access-amendment.title: Amendment
data-access-amendment.cannot-add: You do not have the permission to add an amendment.

delete-dialog.title: Delete Amendment
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete amendment '{{arg0}}' requested by '{{arg1}}'?

submit.invalid: The amendment cannot be submitted because of an incomplete application form.

status-change-confirmation.title: Status Change Confirmation
status-change-confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to {{arg0}} this amendment?
status-change-confirmation.message-review: Are you sure you want to put this amendment under review?

I.title: Modifications on Contact and Research Project Information

A.title: Modifications on Name, institution, and contact details of the Applicant (Principal Applicant)
A.info: Please ensure that a full postal address and a valid institutional e-mail address are included. In case of more than one affiliation, applicants are asked to only provide their contact information pertaining to the institution they are affiliated with for the purpose of this research project.

B.title: Modifications on Name, institution, and contact details of the authorized institutional representative
B.info: Please include a full postal address and a valid institutional e-mail address.

C.title: Modifications on Title of the Research Project
C.website-help: If available, please provide the address of the research project website as well.

D.title: Adding names of authorized personnel (within your institution)
D.info: Please provide the names of all investigators, collaborators, data managers and research staff that will have access to the research data in order to work on the research project. A valid institutional e-mail address for each name along with their job title and function is also required.
D.check: No personnel will require access to the research data.

E.title: Adding names of authorized students (within your institution)
E.info: Please provide the names of all students who will have access to the research data in order to work on the project. A valid e-mail address for each name is required. Students at other institutions should not be included in this list.
E.check: No students will require access to the research data.

F.title: Modifications on Research Project (scientific abstract)
F.info: Please provide a clear scientific description of the research project, its specific aims, methodology and deliverables and how it meets our objectives, in no more than 500 words. Also, please ensure to clearly explain how our research data will be used in the research project.

G.title: Modifications on Lay summary of the project
G.info: Please provide a short, accessible description of the project for the general public in no more than 200 words. Scientific jargon should be avoided to a reasonable extent. This description will be made available on the consortium public access registry and may be used in a variety of communications materials produced by the consortium (e.g. brochures, reports to stakeholders, press releases, blogs etc.).

documents.title: Modifications on Documents
documents.reb-research-protocol: Research Ethics Board approved research protocol
documents.reb-decision-letter: Decision letter from a Research Ethics Board
documents.peer-review: Proof of scientific peer-review, if available

signature.title: Signature
signature.check: I have completed all mandatory fields, included all necessary documents, and hereby submit this application.

data-access-request.title: Data Access Request
data-access-request.title-help: Short summary to help identifying the request.
data-access-request.documents-help: Select one or more documents to be attached to the data access request.

action-log.title: Action
action-log.required: Both inputs must be filled before submitting

delete.title: Delete Action Log Item
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete action '{{action}}' made by '{{author}}' on '{{changedOn}}'?

delete-dialog.title: Delete Data Access Request
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete Data Access '{{arg0}}' requested by '{{arg1}}'?

submit.invalid: The request cannot be submitted because of an incomplete application form.

validation.success: Your form is complete and ready to be submitted.
validation.error: Your form is incomplete, please correct the errors.

status-change-confirmation.title: Status Change Confirmation

status-change-confirmation.message-review: Are you sure you want to put this access request under review?

schema-form.title: Form
schema-form.info: The custom network form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

schema-form.title: Form
schema-form.info: The custom harmonization study form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

schema-form.title: Form
schema-form.info: The custom study form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

taxonomy-config.title: Search
taxonomy-config.info: The search criteria can be configured in accordance with the model.

terms.info: The terms describe the possible values of the criterion. In the case of a numerical type (integer or decimal), the terms represent some ranges of values.

criterion-dialog.name-help: Unique name identifying this search criterion.
criterion-dialog.repeatable-help: Search for exact match or contained value.
criterion-dialog.facet-help: A facet criterion is exposed in the faceted list page.
criterion-dialog.facet-position-help: Number to order the facets (lower appears first).
criterion-dialog.facet-expanded-help: Determines whether the facet is opened or closed when list page is loaded.
criterion-dialog.field-help: Fully qualified field name in the document model (if different from the name).
criterion-dialog.type-help: The type of search facet: range selection for a numerical type, open input for a text type etc.
criterion-dialog.hidden-help: A hidden criterion is excluded from search.
criterion-dialog.term-sort-key-help: The order by which terms of the citerion are listed.
criterion-dialog.range-aggregation-help: Numerical criterion with terms as range intervals.

error.duplicate-criterion-alias: This field is already associated with a criterion. Only a numerical field can have two criteria, a discrete and a range criterion.

term-dialog.name-help: Unique name identifying this search criterion possible value.
term-dialog.keywords-help: Optional list of keywords useful when building search requests.
term-dialog.unique-name: The name of a criterion value must be unique.

delete-dialog.title: Delete {{arg0}}
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete the {{arg0}} '{{arg1}}'?

schema-form.title: Form
schema-form.info: The custom collected dataset form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

schema-form.title: Form
schema-form.info: The custom harmonized dataset form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

data-access-config.title: Data Access Configuration

properties.title: Properties
properties.info: Some properties of the request will be extracted from the application form model according to their specified JSON field path.

data-access-config.summary-field-help: The lay summary of the request.
data-access-config.saved: Data Access Form is successfully updated.
data-access-config.amendments-enabled-help: Enable the capability of requesting amendments to an approved data access request.

pdf-download.title: PDF Download
pdf-download.info: The data collected in the form can be rendered in a PDF file. Choose one of the following options:

pdf-template.title: PDF Template
pdf-template.info: A PDF template is to be provided with field names matching the application form schema.

pdf-embedded.title: Printable Page
pdf-embedded.info: Render the data access request form as a printable page.

schema-form.title: Application Form
schema-form.info: The form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

schema.info: The form schema specifies the data structure.

definition.info: The form definition specifies how to display the schema and how to validate the data inputs.

model.info: The form model stores the valid input data, invalid values are excluded.

data-access-config.private-comment-permission: Give access to the private comments section.

action-log.title: Predefined Action Names
action-log.help: An action name is a translation key that must be preceded by data-access-request.action-log.config.label., here is where you can add new translations.
action-log.action-logs-permission: Apply the same permission to associated action logs

id-generation.title: ID Generation
id-generation.info: The ID of the data access requests can be generated following a pattern.
id-generation.prefix-help: Generated IDs will start with the specified text. Only alpha-numeric characters, underscores and hyphens are accepted.
id-generation.length-help: Length of the generated part of the ID (i.e. not including the prefix).

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.info: Emails can be sent to applicant and data access officers when an event happens on the data access request. Events can be: status change or comment. Notification email subjects can contain the following placeholders: ${organization}, ${title} and ${id} for the request id.
notifications.submitted-help: Email is sent to data access officers and to applicant on data access request submission.
notifications.reviewed-help: Email is sent to applicant when its data access request is being reviewed.
notifications.approved-help: Email is sent to applicant when its data access request is approved.
notifications.rejected-help: Email is sent to applicant when its data access request is rejected.
notifications.reopened-help: Email is sent to applicant when its data access request is reopened.
notifications.commented-help: Email is sent to applicant and data access officers when the data access request is commented.
notifications.attachment-help: Email is sent to applicant and data access officers when the document list of the data access request is updated.
notifications.conditionallyApproved-help: Email is sent to applicant when its data access request is in the 'Conditionally Approved' state.

workflow.title: Workflow
workflow.info: The data access request goes through several steps. Some minimum settings can be applied to control this workflow.
workflow.with-review-help: Between the submission and the approval/rejection of the data access request, an intermediate state can be used to inform applicant that its request is being processed.
workflow.approved-final-help: If not final, an approved data access request can be reinstated to its previous state.
workflow.rejected-final-help: If not final, a rejected data access request can be reinstated to its previous state.
workflow.with-conditional-approval-help: Between the submission and the approval/rejection of the data access request, an intermediate state can be used to allow the applicant to edit its request.

permissions.title: Data Access Permissions
permissions.info: Grant permissions to Read any data access requests.

syntax-error.definition: Form definition is not a valid document, please revise and correct the errors.
syntax-error.schema: Form schema is not a valid document, please revise and correct the errors.

parse-error.definition: Form definition is not a valid document, please contact your administrator to configure the form definition.
parse-error.schema: Form schema is not a valid document, please contact your administrator to configure the form schema.

schema-form.title: Amendment Form
schema-form.info: The amendment form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

properties.title: Properties
properties.info: Some properties of the amendment will be extracted from the application form model according to their specified JSON field path.

amendment.summary-field-help: The lay summary of the amendment.

delete-dialog.title: Delete Key
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete '{{key}}'?

error.key-character-error: Key contains invalid characters. Please avoid characters such as spaces, '.', '~' and '!'.

key-list.modal-add-help: Do not use spaces, '.', '~', '!' and hyphenate multiple words.

save-alert.success: All your changes were successfully saved.

syntax-error.definition: Form definition is not a valid document, please revise and correct the errors.
syntax-error.schema: Form schema is not a valid document, please revise and correct the errors.

parse-error.definition: Form definition is not a valid document, please contact your administrator to configure the form definition.
parse-error.schema: Form schema is not a valid document, please contact your administrator to configure the form schema.

schema-form.title: Form
schema-form.info: The form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

schema.info: The form schema specifies the data structure.

definition.info: The form definition specifies how to display the schema and how to validate the data inputs.

model.info: The form model stores the valid input data, invalid values are excluded.

project-config.title: Research Project Configuration
project-config.saved: Research Project Form is successfully updated.

schema-form.title: Form
schema-form.info: The research project form can be specified both in terms of data structure (schema) and data display and validation (definition). See form schema documentation for more details.

schema.info: The form schema specifies the data structure.

definition.info: The form definition specifies how to display the schema and how to validate the data inputs.

model.info: The form model stores the valid input data, invalid values are excluded.

delete-dialog.title: Delete Comment
delete-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this comment by '{{arg0}}'?

graphics.geo-chart-title: Distribution of studies by country of residence
graphics.study-design-chart-title: Distribution of studies by study design
graphics.number-participants-chart-title: Distribution of studies by number of participants

restore-dialog.title: Restoring Project from Revision
restore-dialog.message: Are you sure you want to restore this revision from '{{arg0}}'?

status.title: Status
status.help: Specify the timeline of the project.
status.start-help: Start date of the project. Date format: dd-mm-yyyy.
status.end-help: Expected or effective end date of the project. Date format: dd-mm-yyyy.

contact.title: Contact Details
contact.help: Specify the Principal Investigator's contact information.
contact.name: Name
